name: tempest
description: This is a monorepo for the Tempest stream library

scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes && rimraf packages/**/*.log packages/**/*.log.* && rimraf *.log && rimraf node_modules
scripts.postinstall: npm run scripts:symlink && lerna exec -- npm install
scripts.release:post: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): build dist/' && lerna-semantic-release post
scripts.release: npm run release:pre && npm run release:perform && npm run release:post
